title: Air Force One Departure from Coast Guard Air Station Cape Cod in Massachusetts | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
August 22, 2015

 



Air Force One Departure from Coast Guard Air Station Cape Cod in Massachusetts





	WASHINGTON, DC – On Sunday, August 23, the First Family will travel from Martha’s Vineyard aboard Marine One to Coast Guard Air Station Cape Cod. The departure from Martha’s Vineyard is travel pool coverage only.   

	Following the arrival at Coast Guard Air Station Cape Cod, the First Family will travel aboard Air Force One to Washington, D.C. The departure from Coast Guard Air Station Cape Cod will be open to the press.

	The departure of Air Force One is open to pre-credentialed media, but closed to the public.

	Members of the media who wish to cover the departure of Air Force One must RSVP via the following link by 8:00 AM ET TOMORROW, Sunday, August 23: https://obamawhitehouse.archives.gov/webform/media-rsvp-air-force-one-departure-coast-guard-air-station-cape-cod-massachusetts

Please note that you must copy and paste the link into your browser and remove the brackets to access the RSVP form.

MEDIA LOGISTICS BELOW ARE FOR PLANNING PURPOSES ONLY, NOT FOR REPORTING

All times are Eastern Daylight Time.

SUNDAY, AUGUST 23, 2015
Air Force One Departure from Coast Guard Air Station Cape Cod

Media Entrance:
	Bourne Gate/Main Gate
	99 Connery Ave.
	Buzzards Bay, MA 02542


Media Pre-set: 4:00 PM – 5:00 PM (All live trucks MUST arrive no later than 4:00PM to park and cable-in during this time. Media will not have access to their live trucks or equipment during security sweeps from 5:00 PM – 6:30 PM) 

Live truck parking: directed on-site from the Main Gate by military personnel via vehicular escort.
General Media Parking: directed on-site from the Main Gate by military personnel via vehicular escort.

Media Access & Check-in: 6:30 PM (All media must be at the Main Gate no later than 6:30 PM.)
Air Force One Approximate Departure Time: 8:25 PM
Cable Run (distance from live trucks to media riser): 300 feet
Throw (distance from media riser to Air Force One): 150 feet
Contact for logistical questions: Jeff Tiller, jtiller@who.eop.gov or 202-503-5692 mobile

	 

	###
